item.title: 英国债券再次下跌，为预算周期间的暴跌画上句号
item.description: 在工党政府发布关键性预算案并计划额外大幅抛售债券引发抛售潮后，英国债券下跌，延续了本周的大幅跌势。【原文：UK bonds fell, extending sharp losses this week after the Labour government’s pivotal budget and plans for additional steep bond sales unleashed a wave of selling.】

item.title: 核能复兴对铀价格的影响
item.description:
它会成为美国变革的主要受益者吗？【原文：

Could it be a major beneficiary of changes in the US?

】

item.title: 奇货可居：核能复兴对铀意味着什么（播客）
item.description: 有一种对铀的崇拜：投资者和交易商相信核能是能源的未来，因此这种重要的商品最终会成为大赢家。在过去几年里，铀的价格大幅上涨。但铀市场的经济效益如何？它对一些正在重开的发电厂有多敏感？在本期节目中，我们将与伯恩斯坦公司美洲能源与转型部门主管、大宗商品专家鲍勃-布拉克特（Bob Brackett）进行对话。【原文：There’s something of a uranium cult out there: the investors and traders who believe that nuclear is the future of energy, and therefore this crucial commodity will end up being a huge winner. And over the last several years, the price has gone up substantially. But what are the economics of the uranium market? And how sensitive is it to some of these power plants that are reopening? On this episode, we speak with commodities guru Bob Brackett, head of Americas energy and transition at Bernstein】

item.title: 台湾进口俄罗斯石脑油数量创历史新高
item.description: 10 月份，台湾石化行业进口了创纪录数量的俄罗斯石脑油，抢购数千英里外炼油厂生产的新鲜供应。【原文：Taiwan’s petrochemical industry imported record amounts of Russian naphtha in October, snapping up fresh supplies being churned out by an oil refinery thousands of miles away.】

item.title: 瑞士通胀意外放缓至 2021 年中以来最弱水平
item.description: 瑞士通胀意外放缓，加强了瑞士国家银行进一步降息的理由，并加剧了对物价增长可能低于央行目标的担忧。【原文：Swiss inflation slowed unexpectedly, strengthening the case for further rate cuts by the Swiss National Bank and fueling worries that price growth could undershoot the central bank’s target.】

item.title: 尼日利亚通过大赦计划寻求藏匿在银行外的美元
item.description: 尼日利亚公布了一项大赦计划，将个人囤积在银行外的外汇提取出来，以支持该国货币，该国货币周四跌至新低。【原文：Nigeria unveiled an amnesty program to draw out foreign-exchange hoarded by individuals outside banks in a bid to support the nation’s currency, which plummeted to a new low on Thursday.】

item.title: 诺斯沃尔特公司倒闭事件导致瑞典十月份破产率居高不下
item.description: 上个月，瑞典电池制造商 Northvolt AB 出现危机，导致该公司位于 Skelleftea 的主要扩建项目资不抵债，破产率创下历史新高。【原文：The crisis at Swedish battery maker Northvolt AB contributed to an historically high rate of bankruptcies last month, when the company’s main expansion project in Skelleftea went insolvent.】

item.title: 英国商业大臣承认增税可能打击招聘和薪酬增长
item.description: 英国商务大臣乔纳森-雷诺兹（Jonathan Reynolds）承认，本周政府预算案中宣布的增税措施可能会阻碍企业雇佣员工和提高薪资的能力。【原文：UK Business Secretary Jonathan Reynolds accepted tax hikes announced in the government’s budget this week may hinder companies’ ability to hire people and raise salaries.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英国 10 月房价增幅低于预期
日元升值打击海外资产，GPIF 创 2020 年以来最严重损失
item.description: 由于日元反弹抵消了海外证券的收益，加上国内股市下跌，日本政府养老金投资基金出现了 2020 年以来的最大季度亏损。【原文：Japan’s Government Pension Investment Fund posted its biggest quarterly loss since 2020 as a rebound in the yen erased gains on overseas securities and domestic stocks declined.】

item.title: 出价过低，巴基斯坦国家航空公司股权出售前景不明
item.description: 在首次出价低于约 3.06 亿美元的最低价格后，巴基斯坦出售国家国旗航空公司巴基斯坦国际航空公司（Pakistan International Airlines Corp.【原文：Pakistan’s sale of national flag carrier Pakistan International Airlines Corp. has become uncertain after the maiden bid was below the minimum price of about $306 million.】

item.title: 野村利润超出预期，前景因丑闻而黯淡
item.description: 野村控股公司（Nomura Holdings Inc.【原文：Nomura Holdings Inc.’s profit rose more than analysts expected last quarter, buoyed by strong results across its businesses including wealth management, trading and investment banking.】

item.title: 西班牙洪灾过后，欧洲将迎来温和干燥的十一月
item.description: 月初气温短暂下降后，欧洲将迎来一个温和干燥的十一月。【原文：After a brief drop in temperatures at the beginning of the month, Europe is in for a mild and dry November.】

item.title: 高盛称特朗普关税可能使中国将重心转向消费者
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：Higher US tariffs on Chinese goods could dent growth but also force a long-awaited shift to the consumer in the world’s second-largest economy, according to economists at Goldman Sachs Group Inc.】

item.title: 麦格理在出售 AirTrunk 后仍押注人工智能数据中心热潮
item.description: 麦格理集团（Macquarie Group Ltd.）首席执行官谢马拉-维克拉马纳亚克（Shemara Wikramanayake）说，麦格理集团最近出售 AirTrunk 的巨额交易只是数据中心方面的热身活动。【原文：Macquarie Group Ltd.’s recent megadeal to sell AirTrunk was just a warm up act when it comes to data centers, chief executive Shemara Wikramanayake said.】

item.title: 花旗集团中国区总裁陆兆禧上任不到一年即离职
item.description: 花旗集团（Citigroup Inc.【原文：Citigroup Inc.’s country officer and head of banking for China Luke Lu is departing after being in the role for less than a year.】

item.title: 黄金周带动澳门博彩收入飙升至新高
item.description: 由于中国国家黄金周假期刺激了旅游和消费，澳门博彩业收入在 10 月份跃升 6.6%，创下科维德（Covid）关闭旅游以来的新高。【原文：Macau’s gaming revenue jumped 6.6% in October, rising to a new high since Covid shut down travel as China’s national Golden Week holiday fueled tourism and spending.】

item.title: 出口坚挺，原油反弹，棕榈油飙升至两年新高
item.description: 棕榈油连续第三天上涨，达到两年多来的最高水平，原因是市场需求旺盛，担心供应紧张。【原文：Palm oil rallied for a third day to its highest level in more than two years on strong demand amid concerns over tightening supply.】

item.title: 大科技溃败，邦德裁判所向英国袭来
item.description:
"华丽七侠 "再也无法回避人工智能的盈利预期，而市场的守夜人却对里维斯拧紧了螺丝。【原文：

Magnificent Seven can no longer evade AI earnings expectations, while market vigilantes tighten the screws on Reeves.

】

item.title: Olam 确认沙特阿拉伯对农业综合企业部门的收购要约
item.description: 据一份交易所文件显示，Olam 集团有限公司已收到一家沙特国有投资公司提出的非约束性指示性报价，收购其农业综合企业部门的剩余股份。【原文：Olam Group Ltd. has received a non-binding indicative offer from a state-owned Saudi investment firm to acquire the remaining stake in its agribusiness unit, according to an exchange filing.】

item.title: General Atlantic 领投初创企业 Insider 的 5 亿美元融资
item.description: 全球人工智能营销技术平台 Insider 在 General Atlantic 领投的一轮融资中筹集了 5 亿美元；这笔现金流入将支持其在美国拓展业务的计划。【原文：Insider, a global marketing technology platform that uses artificial intelligence, raised $500 million in a funding round led by General Atlantic — a cash influx that will support plans to expand its business in the US.】

item.title: 继 iPhone 16s 之后，印尼又封杀了谷歌 Pixel 手机：印度尼西亚
item.description: 据当地媒体 Kontan 报道，印度尼西亚禁止销售 Pixel 手机，称 Alphabet Inc.【原文：Indonesia has prohibited the sale of Pixel phones, saying Alphabet Inc.’s Google has failed to meet domestic content requirements, according to a report by local media outlet Kontan.】

item.title: 新新加坡 "战略为日兴 AM 指数带来 20% 的超额回报
item.description: 表现第二好的新加坡基金以蓝筹股为目标，这些股票的长期表现有可能超过新加坡基准指数。【原文：The second-best-performing Singapore fund targets blue-chip stocks with potential to outperform the city-state’s benchmark index over the long term.】

item.title: 特朗普当选几率下降，比特币冲向纪录高点的步伐受阻
item.description: 随着支持加密货币的共和党提名人唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）在博彩市场上的当选赔率下降，比特币冲击历史最高点的势头正在减弱。【原文：Bitcoin’s push toward a record high is fizzling as pro-crypto Republican nominee Donald Trump’s election odds drop in betting markets.】

item.title: 英特尔、三星业绩反弹因人工智能挑战而昙花一现
item.description: 英特尔公司（Intel Corp. ）和三星电子公司（Samsung Electronics Co.【原文：Intel Corp. and Samsung Electronics Co. have collectively shed $227 billion in market value this year on their lack of leadership in artificial intelligence.】

item.title: 中国工厂活动在刺激政策推动下意外扩张
item.description: 一项民间调查显示，尽管有为期一周的假期，中国上个月的制造业活动仍意外回升，这是在中国政府为支撑经济而推出刺激计划之后，中国经济企稳的又一迹象。【原文：China’s manufacturing activity unexpectedly picked up last month despite a week-long holiday, according to a private survey, a further sign of stabilization after Beijing unleashed a stimulus package to shore up the economy.】

item.title: 日本汽车制造商丰田和日产面临需求疲软和中国竞争
item.description: 丰田汽车公司（Toyota Motor Corp.）和日产汽车公司（Nissan Motor Co.【原文：Toyota Motor Corp. and Nissan Motor Co. will offer clues on the outlook for Japan’s auto industry when they post earnings against a backdrop of faltering global demand, production cuts and intense competition.】

item.title: 布鲁克菲尔德将总部迁至纽约以获得指数资格
item.description: 布鲁克菲尔德资产管理公司（Brookfield Asset Management）将总部从多伦多迁至纽约，以接触更多的美国股票指数，吸引更多的投资者。【原文：Brookfield Asset Management moved its head office to New York from Toronto to gain access to more US stock indexes and attract more investors.】

item.title: 债券交易员从美国就业数据中寻找美联储降息计划的线索
item.description: 由于周五受飓风和罢工影响的美国就业报告为下周美联储政策决定提供了最后的线索，一直在对冲美国国债进一步下挫的投资者正准备迎接波动。【原文：Investors who’ve been hedging against a deeper selloff in US Treasuries are preparing for volatility as Friday’s hurricane- and strike-tinged US employment report offers final clues ahead of next week’s Federal Reserve policy decision.】

item.title: 打造机器人未来的国家
item.description:
在彭博社原创系列Momentum的这一集中，我们将了解日本如何将机器人技术作为一项产业和日常生活的一部分。【原文：

On this episode of the Bloomberg Originals series Momentum, we discover how Japan came to embrace robotics as both an industry and part of daily life.

】
